page.title: 08HIDDEN AWAY HOUSING
page.content: This is a remote area with a tiny village centre and many isolted houses some hidden away and almost inaccessible. Many are very old and on the whole they are in immaculate condition and beautifully modernised. There are a few small cottages that are in poor condition. A few modern houses have been built and on the whole they blend in with the surrounding countryside. In the immediate village area about half the houses were originally built by the council for rent although some of them have now been bought by their occupants. As it is difficult to get planning permission for new buildings some people convert old barns or very old buildings into houses.
